about: Bachelor's degree in Mathematics from the University of Waterloo (2020-2023).

I have a diverse skill set that includes Java, Python, SQL, PL/SQL, NoSQL, GraphQL, JavaScript/TypeScript, and Shell Scripting, along with expertise in frameworks such as Spring Boot and technologies like AWS (EC2, S3, RDS, Lambda), Redis, Docker, React, Spring Cloud, Kubernetes, Nginx, RabbitMQ, Databricks, MyBatis, Zookeeper, and Git.

With my knowledge and skills, I am confident in my ability to take on challenging projects and deliver high-quality results. I am a quick learner, constantly seeking new knowledge and skills to improve my abilities.
I am currently working at McKeil Marine Ltd as a Software Engineer, where I have developed and optimized systems that increase profitability and efficiency.
